abstract: What was your favorite pared-down video, concert or otherwise, from the 1980s or 1990s?
snippet: What was your favorite pared-down video, concert or otherwise, from the 1980s or 1990s?
lead_paragraph: Chuck Klosterman's excellent memoir "Fargo Rock City" almost convinced me that I missed something by not caring about hair metal. But when it came to my own MTV viewing habits, I was always a minimalist - give me a concert clip, or even a bit of straight-on lip syncing to a good song, like this clip of Stevie Nicks and Tom Petty trading verses on the indelible "Stop Draggin' My Heart Around."
